name: Raise a Stitch
description:
Made a really bad version of raise a floppa :/ (literally the full game)

also it might be the longest project i made so far and the best also keep in mind its kinda buggy because it needs updates which i will do soon

WASD or arrows to move, E to interact with stuff and use mouse left click to attack (if you have a sword)

you can Play with people around the world with separated devices!

added an update!: if your somehow still playing this game, you might see me play this game with a unique skin ;D

(if you want a skin too then just ask in the comments)
